info.brief_description: You get the power to travel to different Anime/VG worlds and possess female characters.
info.description:
Welcome to my Female Anime Possession story.

View count: 55,000!

Here is the link to Bleach: Ichigo's new power

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1580143-Female-AnimeVG-Character-Po...


-Lonedynasty



The plot:

In this story you are RJ, a teenager who finds a box from an unknown person and opens it to find a mysterious watch with a note inside. The note tells you about the power the watch brings to the person who wears it. Being curious you put on the watch and wake up in ghost form in an anime or video game world with the power to possess females in that world. Bleach, Death Note, One Piece, and a lot more worlds you can go to. Which one will you go to and who will you possess? You control what happens!



Rules:

You can only possess females.

Please make longer chapters that are not just 2 or 3 sentences. Try and aim for 7 or 8 sentences or more. Please don't write dull boring chapters or chapters with just mindless sex, well I don't mind the sex just make it interesting!

Sex is fine.
No turning the main character or any non gay characters gay.
No ending the story.

Anyone can email me! I am welling to provide feedback if anyone wants me to!


Have fun possessing your fav girls from anime/video games!
